author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: DAO Token Market
description: DAO Net为DeFi团队提供快速可持续的资金，然而部署DAO Net需要一个DAO代币的市场。

f6_assessments.q0: The problem statement could be better articulated for the broad audience as the current explanation does not provide enough context of the problem. The team's answers in the comments section provide more light regarding the problem that the proposer is attempting to solve, and I'd suggest the team to integrate those points into the main part of the proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer presented a detailed plan to implement the idea, including capabilities needed, relevancy of the team experience, breakdown of the budget and timeline, and considerations for risks  and mitigation. Given the novelty of the idea, I think it'd be very helpful for the community if the team can gather and improve on the materials presented in their post to build into a whitepaper.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer clearly list out measurable and auditable KPIs for each phase of the implementation, making it highly auditable. Revisiting the problem statement, had it been more clearly articulated, it would help been more helpful for the voters to audit how well the solution could solve such problem set.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal addresses one of the micro development challenges for funding. There are tie-ins to other proposers which could be a limitation should those not be funded.
f6_assessments.q1: This group has a variety of experience pertaining to the project which makes it likely that the proposal could be implemented successfully. There is the caveat that it has a strong link to the Crypto Fusion Funder Proposal which would be significantly beneficial if it is funded. Otherwise they proposer will have to withdraw. They don't seem to have solid contingency plan if that occurs. In a future application it would be worth the effort to propose a backup model.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer has provided a solid model to audit progress again contingent upon the funding of the Crypto Fusion Funder proposal. In the case of non funding for that proposal the project dependencies render outcomes to nothing. Otherwise the proposal seems to gave the capacity (again with the noted dependency) to be successful.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal would be equally beneficial for Cardano DeFi and DAO-appeal. As it centers on the AMM and DEX outreach, I think DeFi is the correct choice. The benefits would be enormous, potentially giving Cardano a huge boost in the race for DeFi staking dominance / catch-up with Ethereum.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has the relevant experience and shares a lof of detail about the roadmap. The action plan is giving a good top-level overview, but lacks implementation detail. The reader of the proposal learns a lot about the problem with the status quo, but not enough about the solution.
f6_assessments.q2: The amount of detail afforded to both performance metrics and roadmap is commendable. The proposal contains both risk assessment and risk mitigation measures, making it stand out among its peers.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal identifies a difficulty in the creation of DAOs on Cardano and attempts to solve it through this solution. The team clearly explains how this solution will be used by future projects in the Cardano ecosystem. And since the project addresses a very broad and complex issue which is DAOs creation and management, it becomes clear that if implemented this solution can change the process of how projects are getting funds and interacting with the community.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal includes links to some team members details, it also includes a very extensive explanation of the solution and lists the resources needed and the financial allocations to be done. Furthermore, it included a clear roadmap that seems to be ambitious but doable.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal included clear milestones with KPIs that one can assess to check the project's development. It also determines some of the issues this project might face and how they will deal with them. After reading all of the information I feel fairly comfortable to give it a score of 4.

solution: 将DAO代币与现有的DEX和自动做市商结合起来，以促进DAO代币与ADA的交换。
experience: 一个由区块链开发者、Plutus先锋、SPO操作员、社区顾问和解决方案分析师组成的经验丰富的团队。
